English:
A very readable book with a story that is suspenseful enough to keep us glued to the book. Throughout the book, our impression of the characters keeps changing and we ended up with two completely plausible but diametrically opposed hypotheses about what really happened. It gives the reader some food for thought. The book is a classic that has been adapted for theater, television and cinema and, recently, the Netflix series The Haunting of the Bly Manor, based on the story. It‚Äôs a 3.5 that I round up to 4. Worth a read.
